com.axonivy.jmx

Annotation Type MCompositionReference


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
 @Inherited
public @interface MCompositionReference

    Use this annotation on fields that reference mbeans or methods that return references to mbeans which should be registered and unregistered
    if the parent mbean (the mbean containing the annotated fields or methods) is registered or unregistered.

    Warning:
    Only use this annotation on fields or methods that references the same composition mbean during the whole lifecycle of the parent mbean.
    If one changes the referenced object after the parent mbean is registered then the framework does not unregister the old composition mbean
    and registers the new referenced composition mbean. Moreover the old composition mbean will still be strong referenced by the framework and therefore not garbage collected as long as the parent bean is registered.

    Example:

       @MBean("Demo:type=ParentBean")
  public class ParentBean
  {
     @MCompositionReference
    private CompositionBean composition = new CompositionBean;
  }

   @MBean("Demo:type=CompositionBean")
  public class CompositionBean
  {

  }

    If now one calls:

      ParentBean bean = new ParentBean();
  MBeans.registerMBeanFor(bean);

    then two MBeans get registered the Demo:type=ParentBean and Demo:type=CompositionBean.
    Moreover, if now one calls:

      MBeans.unregisterMBeanFor(bean);

    then also both MBeans are unregistered.

    Since:
    28.06.2013, 23.08.2013
    Author:
    rwei, rwei

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean concatName
      If set to true then the name of the composition mbean is build by concat the name of the parent mbean with the value attribute of the composition mbean @MBeanannotation.

    • Element Detail

      • concatName

        public abstract boolean concatName
        If set to true then the name of the composition mbean is build by concat the name of the parent mbean with the value attribute of the composition mbean @MBeanannotation.
        Returns:
        true if the name should be concatenated
        Default:
        false
